generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a red bike lane, extending across the frame.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved sidewalk adjacent to the road, bordered by bollards.
- building: A multi-story building with commercial signage is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalk and in the background.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk.
- car: A dark-colored car is parked on the left side of the image.
- motorcycle: A white scooter is parked on the sidewalk near the building.
- traffic sign: A blue traffic sign indicating pedestrian crossing and a no-parking sign are visible on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those holding the traffic signs and bollards along the sidewalk.
